title: How Recode's Shark Tank Rejection Boosted Its Growth ? - Indian Retailer
summary: This article discusses how several Indian direct-to-consumer brands are planning to drive sales during the festive season. The companies are ramping up product offerings, revamping supply chain networks, and integrating technology in order to meet the expected increase in demand. The article also provides insights into the sales targets and future outlook of the companies.
greenwashing: The article does not provide enough information to determine whether any of the described products or processes are examples of greenwashing.

title: SS Beauty to Bank on Aggressive Omnichannel Model, to reach 25 Doors by Next Fiscal: Biju Kassim, President ... - Indian Retailer
summary: The beauty and personal care industry in India is booming, with D2C brands experiencing remarkable growth. Several brands, such as SUGAR Cosmetics, The Body Shop, Plum, Colorbar, Kapiva, Earth Rhythm, Arata, BlushBee, Crazy Owl - Your Skin Co, Pilgrim, and iluvia Professional, have made significant strides in 2022 and have ambitious plans for 2023. These brands are focusing on product innovation, omnichannel presence, and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE, as the article discusses the development of new and improved products and processes that contribute to environmental sustainability, such as The Body Shop's commitment to becoming 100% Vegan and Plum's focus on creating multifunctional products to reduce the need for multiple products.
business_innovation: TRUE, as the article discusses the development of new or improved products or business processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous products or business processes, such as SUGAR Cosmetics' launch of 120+ retail stores and iluvia Professional's introduction of patented treatment technologies.
green_product: TRUE, as the article discusses the development of products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as The Body Shop's range of Vegan products and Earth Rhythm's focus on clean and green beauty.
green_process: TRUE, as the article discusses the development of processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, such as The Body Shop's use of renewable resources and recycling materials and iluvia Professional's introduction of new treatment technologies.
greenwashing: FALSE, as the article does not provide any evidence that the described product or process innovation is an example of greenwashing.
